keyPolicies.policyDescription: Simon Beard is passionate about fighting for cleaner air. Dartford’s congested and polluted roads are killing people right now. This has to stop! The Liberal Democrats will make our air fit to breathe again.
Everyone knows our health and care services urgently need extra funding. However, only the Liberal Democrats will give them the support they require.
Dartford’s schools are being threatened with £7 million budget cuts by a Conservative party that has stopped listening. Visit schoolcuts.org.uk to see how this will directly affect our children.

issues.brexitEurope: A disastrous hard Brexit will hit people in the pocket, with the poorest families hurt most. We need to protect jobs by keeping Britain in the single market and give the people a say over their future. The Liberal Democrats are challenging the Conservatives over their hard Brexit plans.
issues.economy: A hard Brexit will hit jobs and raise prices.
issues.education: Opposing school cuts: Dartford’s schools are being threatened with £7 million budget cuts by a Conservative party that has stopped listening.

examples: Here in Dartford local campaigner Simon Beard will be fighting for you - on Brexit, air pollution, schools and our health service.
Simon Beard is passionate about fighting for cleaner air.
Everyone knows our health and care services urgently need extra funding.
